attributes.action: request that ALL Mp's make a goodwill payment of £10000 each into a charitable foundation as a way of apology to tax payers for the Mp's expenses debacle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that if every MP were asked to make this payment it would mean that those who have not been as guilty as others in "mis-claiming" expenses would ensure that something like this would never happen again. I think they should all have to accept a collective guilt as they have allowed this to manifest through their gross negligence and self interest.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
